channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 作业二
item.description: 1.Information is that which informs. In other words, it is the answer to a question of some kind. 2.Positional notation is a method of representing or encoding numbers 3.Algorithm is a self-contained step-by-step set of operations to be performed. Algorithms perform calculation, data processing, and/or automated reasoning tasks. 4.Software bug is an error, flaw, failure or fault in a computer program or system that causes it to produce an incorrect or unexpected result, or to behave in unintended ways.

item.title: 作业一
item.description: A computer is a device that can be instructed to carry out an arbitrary set of arithmetic or logical operations automatically. Computer science is the study of the theory, experimentation, and engineering that form the basis for the design and use of computers. 3.Software is a part of a computer system that consists of data or computer instructions, in contrast to the physical hardware from which the system is built.
